options.content:
# Table Schema Comparison Dashboard
Compare table schema between two environments - Columns, Types, Indexes, Foreign Keys

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(DISTINCT column_name) as columns FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})

SELECT count(DISTINCT column_name) as columns FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})

WITH env1_cols AS (SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})), env2_cols AS (SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})) SELECT count(*) as differences FROM (SELECT e1.column_name FROM env1_cols e1 LEFT JOIN env2_cols e2 ON e1.column_name = e2.column_name WHERE e2.column_name = '' UNION ALL SELECT e2.column_name FROM env2_cols e2 LEFT JOIN env1_cols e1 ON e2.column_name = e1.column_name WHERE e1.column_name = '' UNION ALL SELECT e1.column_name FROM env1_cols e1 JOIN env2_cols e2 ON e1.column_name = e2.column_name WHERE e1.data_type != e2.data_type OR e1.is_nullable != e2.is_nullable) diffs

SELECT count(*) as "${env1}" FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND is_primary_key = 1 AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})

SELECT count(*) as "${env2}" FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND is_primary_key = 1 AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})

SELECT count(*) as "${env1}" FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND is_in_index = 1 AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})

SELECT count(*) as "${env2}" FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND is_in_index = 1 AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})

SELECT count(*) as "${env1}" FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND is_foreign_key = 1 AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})

SELECT count(*) as "${env2}" FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND is_foreign_key = 1 AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})

WITH env1_cols AS (SELECT column_name, column_position, data_type, is_nullable, column_default, is_primary_key, is_in_index, index_names, is_foreign_key, fk_references FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})), env2_cols AS (SELECT column_name, column_position, data_type, is_nullable, column_default, is_primary_key, is_in_index, index_names, is_foreign_key, fk_references FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote})) SELECT coalesce(e1.column_name, e2.column_name) as column_name, multiIf(e1.column_name = '', concat('‚ùå Missing in ', ${env1:singlequote}), e2.column_name = '', concat('‚ùå Missing in ', ${env2:singlequote}), e1.data_type != e2.data_type OR e1.is_nullable != e2.is_nullable, '‚ö†Ô∏è Type Mismatch', '‚úÖ Match') as status, e1.data_type as "${env1} Type", e2.data_type as "${env2} Type", if(e1.is_nullable, 'YES', 'NO') as "${env1} Nullable", if(e2.is_nullable, 'YES', 'NO') as "${env2} Nullable", if(e1.is_primary_key, 'üîë', '') as "${env1} PK", if(e2.is_primary_key, 'üîë', '') as "${env2} PK", if(e1.is_in_index, 'üìá', '') as "${env1} Indexed", if(e2.is_in_index, 'üìá', '') as "${env2} Indexed" FROM env1_cols e1 FULL OUTER JOIN env2_cols e2 ON e1.column_name = e2.column_name ORDER BY coalesce(e1.column_position, e2.column_position)

SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, is_primary_key, index_names, fk_references FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env1:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote}) ORDER BY column_position

SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, is_primary_key, index_names, fk_references FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote} AND scan_time = (SELECT max(scan_time) FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND environment = ${env2:singlequote} AND table_name = ${table_name:singlequote}) ORDER BY column_position

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT application FROM "default"."schema_profiles" ORDER BY application
list.label: Application
list.name: application
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT application FROM "default"."schema_profiles" ORDER BY application

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment
list.label: Environment 1
list.name: env1
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment
list.label: Environment 2
list.name: env2
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND (environment = ${env1:singlequote} OR environment = ${env2:singlequote}) ORDER BY table_name
list.label: Table
list.name: table_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM "default"."schema_profiles" WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND (environment = ${env1:singlequote} OR environment = ${env2:singlequote}) ORDER BY table_name
